title: eLearning Design Strategies for a Multicultural Knowledge Society

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design principles and e-learning platform utilization experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing e-learning design competencies in multicultural environments for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for designing e-learning content that reflects communication differences among multicultural learners
Learners can perform the process of analyzing multicultural e-learning educational requirements using the Delphi research method
Learners can develop e-learning assessment tools integrating elements of fairness, respect, and critical thinking
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
